name: prune
description: A small Chrome extension to help you manage your garden of tabs.

scripts.zip: zip -r release.zip assets src/options src/data-structures src/util src/clients dist favicon.ico service-worker.js manifest.json
scripts.clean: rm -fr dist/ && rm -fr lib && rm -f release.zip
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip

author: Theodore Brockman
